data.title: Forrest Nicholas Brown
data.meta_description: ADDITIONAL FACTS OF NOTE Military Information Age at Enlistment:                       21 years Home Residence during War:    113 S. Market St., Frederick Military Years:         ...
data.text:
ADDITIONAL FACTS OF NOTE

Military Information

Age at Enlistment: 21 years

Home Residence during War: 113 S. Market St., Frederick

Military Years: 1917-1919

National Guard, Corporal

7/20/1917 Sergeant, Company A, 1st Maryland Inf

Company A, 115th Infantry

1/5/1918, Cook, 3rd Officers Training Camp,

Camp McClellan (Alabama)

4/19/1918 Company A, 115th Infantry Regiment

5/12/1918 Promoted to 2nd Lt,

Company I, 113th Infantry

Overseas (6/15/1918-2/2/1919) Center Sector

Meuse-Argonne

10/12/1918 Wounded slightly

10/12/1918 Patient at Hospital

12/20/1918 Casualty Officers Depot (Blois, France)

2/4/1919 Unassigned, Camp Merritt (NJ)

2/18/1919 103 Hoboken Casualty Company

2/10/1919 Unassigned, Camp Meade (MD)

Honorable Discharge 2/13/1919

Decorations: Order of St. Sava (Serbia)

Personal Information

Occupation: Corporate Attorney, US Fidelity & Guarantee Co

Father: Jesse Wilbur Brown, Jr.

Mother: Frances Ann Hobbs

Spouse: Elizabeth Rebecca Wallis

​

Last known residence: 450 Carrollton Drive, Frederick, MD

Cause of Death:

​
